title: The Mystery at Lost Dog Road
description: When a well-liked young man loses his wife and son on a family outing, an entire town mourns. But there is someone who suspects the tragedy was no accident. Keith Morrison reports in this Dateline classic. Originally aired on NBC on October 30, 2009.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
